doc.name: ListDirectory
doc.description: An event to list all the files matching a filter in a directory. Each time it is fired, it updates its files parameter to contain names of all the files (and/or directories) in the specified directory. A filter can be defined to filter the included file names.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The director in which files are to be listed.
A parameter with an ArrayToken containing strings that are names of the files matching the given filter in the specified directory. It is updated every time this event is fired.
The filter that all the included file names must match.
Whether directory names should be included.
Whether file names should be included.
Whether files in the subdirectories should be searched as well.
